column3: there's a dangerous love boy you're no good for me darling yeah you turn me away like i'm begging for a dollar danger baby oh how you hold me i get a chill inside and nothing frightens me darlin'   danger danger dangerous darlin' danger danger dangerous boy danger danger dangerous darlin' he's a dangerous boy   nanananana nanananana baby nanananana nananananananana nanananana baby nanananana baby nanananana nanana he's a dangerous boy
